name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven AWS and Data Science Consultant with 9+ years of experience in designing, developing, and implementing complex applications on **AWS**, including **Amazon SageMaker**, **ECR**, **IAM**, **EMR**, and **JupyterHub**. Proficient in utilizing **Python** for data science projects and implementing **Docker** for containerization. Expertise in **MLOps** practices for optimizing machine learning workflows. Previous experience as a .NET Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in **microservices architecture** and distributed systems, utilizing technologies like **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, **Redis**, **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**. Demonstrated ability to deliver robust solutions, streamline development processes, and enhance performance, alongside effective collaboration across teams to lead projects to successful completion.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **AWS** services including **Amazon SageMaker**, **ECR**, and **EMR** to develop scalable machine learning models, boosting deployment efficiency by **30%**.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization, ensuring consistent development environments across various stages of the pipeline.
Implemented **IAM** policies to enhance security and access management for cloud resources in compliance with industry standards.
Developed and deployed data science workflows using **Python** in **JupyterHub**, streamlining experimentation and collaboration among data scientists.
Applied **MLOps** best practices to automate model training and deployment, reducing time to production by **25%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver data-driven insights, improving decision-making processes.
Conducted performance tuning on ML models, resulting in a **15%** increase in accuracy over previous benchmarks.
Produced comprehensive documentation for processes and models to maintain reproducibility and knowledge transfer within the team.
Engaged in regular code reviews and mentoring sessions to improve coding standards and team efficiency.

Implemented **AWS** solutions, leveraging **Amazon SageMaker** for deploying machine learning models, enhancing data-driven decision-making processes.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, enabling seamless deployment and scalability across environments.
Developed and maintained MLOps processes using **EMR** and **IAM** to ensure secure and efficient handling of large-scale data analytics.
Created and configured **JupyterHub** for collaborative data analysis, facilitating real-time projects with teams across 3 departments.
Designed automation scripts in **Python** to streamline ETL processes, improving data processing speed by **40%**.
Led the deployment of models into production with **ECR**, resulting in a quicker turnaround time of **8 weeks** from development to deployment.
Conducted training sessions for data science teams on MLOps practices and tools, increasing overall team skillset by **20%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project specifications and milestones, ensuring delivery adherence to the **4-month** project timeline.
Optimized data storage and retrieval processes, employing customizable data lakes for better data accessibility.
Mentored junior data scientists on best practices in **Docker** and **AWS** solutions, fostering a knowledge-sharing culture.

Leveraged **AWS** services including **Amazon SageMaker** to deploy machine learning models, optimizing performance with an **EMR** cluster for big data processing.
Utilized **Python** and **JupyterHub** to perform exploratory data analysis and build predictive models, increasing insight generation speed by **30%**.
Implemented **Docker** for containerization of applications, ensuring consistent deployments across environments and reducing setup time by **25%**.
Managed access and security using **IAM** roles, ensuring compliance with best practices for data protection.
Utilized **ECR** for efficient storage and management of Docker images, streamlining the development pipeline.
Collaborated in MLOps initiatives, ensuring smooth model deployment processes and continuous integration for machine learning workflows.
Developed technical documentation and user guides for deployed models and systems, enhancing knowledge sharing across teams.
Participated in daily standups and code reviews, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and alignment with project objectives.
Engaged with cross-functional teams to ensure integration of data science solutions with existing applications, including legacy systems and third-party APIs.
